name: StringUtil_joinTest
description: Unit tests for the StringUtil.join method.

test_cases.name: testJoinEmptyIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the join functionality of StringUtil with an empty iterator.

test_cases.name: testJoinSingleElementIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the join functionality of StringUtil with an iterator containing a single element.

test_cases.name: testJoinMultipleElementsIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the join functionality of StringUtil with an iterator containing multiple elements.
